action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There are green, purple, pink, and orange shapes arranged in a scattered manner. The shapes include crosses and L-shaped blocks.

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several pixelated shapes in different colors on a white background. There are green, purple, pink, and orange shapes arranged in a seemingly random pattern. The shapes are blocky and resemble pieces from a pixel art or retro video game.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There are green, purple, pink, and orange shapes arranged in a scattered manner. The shapes include crosses and L-shaped blocks.

QUESTION: Are there any shapes that form a complete square in your image?
